main_definition: When referring to a person's health, 'ill' means that the individual is not feeling well or is suffering from an illness.

meanings_and_examples.example: She was too ill to attend school today.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not in good mental or emotional state
meanings_and_examples.example: He's been feeling really ill since his dog passed away.
The little boy was being quite ill in class, refusing to listen to the teacher.
She seemed ill at ease during the meeting, expressing her dissatisfaction with the proposed changes.
